name: The Future of Privacy and Proof of Innocence
description: Why is privacy important? How does Proof of Innocence enable privacy-preserving compliance with association sets? Demo of Privacy Pools V1.

speakers.name: Ekrem BAL

Chainway introduced Proof of Innocence, showcased at proofofinnocence.com, which is a privacy-preserving mathematical compliance tool built on Tornado Cash.
